description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, situated at the confluence of the Ganga, Gandak, and Burhi Gandak rivers. This office is integral to the Munger transport division, managing vehicle registrations, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for a region heavily reliant on agriculture and river-based logistics. It oversees seven administrative blocks, ensuring road safety and connectivity across the district's unique riverine geography.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
